pages.text: $(#bd951a)Health:$()$(#ff0000)25$(br)$(#bd951a)DPS:$()$(#ff0000)12.8 (16 DMG/1.25s)$(br)$(#bd951a)Range:$()$(#ff0000)15$(br)$(#bd951a)Seed Recharge Time:$()$(#ff0000)7.5s$(br2)$(#bd951a)Repeater is fierce. He's from the streets. He doesn't take attitude from anybody, plant or zombie, and he shoots peas to keep people at a distance. Secretly, though, Repeater yearns for love.

pages.title: BLOOM & DOOM SEED CO.
pages.text: $(#25228d)Repeater fires two peas at a time.
